documents.document: @CiaraMPSI Walk if you gotta walk buddy. You come first. Fuck everybody.

I just want a pot of tea, a fire and some Simpsons Hit and Run.
@RummHammm I seeee. Great idea if it's done right.
@RummHammm How does mental health soc work? There wasn't one when I was doing my undergrad.
@RichStanton Such a tragically underrated game. I'll never stop being annoyed that they won't run further with it.
(And that's okay)
(And I probably never will)
(I didn't watch the Stranger Things speech)
@darthellen *Starts questioning how many times I've been rejected for being a non-smoker*
Back as a full animator (as opposed to FX) for a little bit. Remarkable how quickly I get rusty.
Probably not though. Their competitive advantage definitely is in the arcade. Foolish to try compete on a less advantageous market.
Like I've barely seen it but it's CLEARLY framed around Kojima's vision for Silent Hills. I wonder if Konami have any regrets on it.
Interested to see how Konami are interpreting the numbers that Capcom are getting with Resi 7.
It is very much Monday. No mistaking it.
@EmzFool Innnteresting. I'll have to take a look.
@EmzFool The Final Girls eh? Is it a horror?
@EmzFool I haven't even seen the trailer yet!
@EmzFool It was so well shot I was astounded. He's so impressive.
Saw John Wick today. Such an enjoyable flick. Pure popcorn. That Keanu lad looks younger at 53 than I do at twenty seven.
@molly_finn_ I'll open up a whole new world of stews to you. You'll see.
@elparkojr Hahah I'll do a regular one the next time I have a day off. This is "Notion Stew".

@amyandcolour You're gonna need to unfollow me.
@fokellh I'm nothing if not selfless.
It's fine like, I don't need to eat.
@WalnutSoap God's work is what you're doing Paul.
Quick, someone encourage me to spend a hundred and fifty euro on another coat in January.
Just made a breakthrough about my own mental health and it's not even ten o'clock.
@Bed_Forever_ I can't see through metal, Kent!
Not that much of a Resi fan but I'm absolutely raging I can't play the new one.

I need a black leather jacket.

@verdygood Totally agree. Gorgeous city, filled with absolute bellends.
My *perfect* Sennheiser HD25s were stolen last summer and I'm still bitter.
@Adamissions I'm hoping to spontaneously combust some time around late February.
@Adamissions On the plus side you don't need to worry about things like rent in six months. We'll all be dead.
@darthellen That's totally vegan too. Get on that cashew butter. It'll rock your socks.
@Adamissions Yep. Just like all the nationalist groups in the UK. Racism is being validated.
@darthellen Aye it's literally 100% cashew nuts. I made this with it. https://t.co/pFGPeA4aqn
@darthellen Well this is like peanut butter but much creamier. You can make fudge with it and everything.
@darthellen Can get it in Supervalu. Will change your life. Goes great with ice cream.
@Adamissions Yep. Crazy that people will stand in front of a live broadcast and be like "yep, Nazi".
@darthellen Give cashew butter a go.
@Adamissions Yeah I wouldn't be able at all. It's also gonna be a lightning rod for dickheads.
@Adamissions Only worked out what it is today. Looks exhausting.
And let's be clear. A dude saying "H*tler did nothing wrong" is a Nazi. There is no ambiguity there.
@jasontammemagi I think current political climates (both US/UK) are doing a lot to enable this and disregard history. Very worrying.
@jasontammemagi My thoughts exactly. Like, there's no more hiding. It's like the Twitter eggs have hatched.

@AidanCoughlan Aye get them healthy fats in!
@AidanCoughlan Well up until now I've been eating the same volume of food but junk so maybe my body has caught up.
@AidanCoughlan Possibly! I think it might just be a complete lack of energy use. Like I'm at a desk ALL day.
@AidanCoughlan Mainly chicken breast, small amount of potato, few veg. So I'd say 50% protein 30% carb 20% fat.
So I only ate about five hundred calories today and I'm not hungry. That's a bit odd.
@karolinecelly I know I really would have thought you'd get in there faster.
